cleaned_text: Vaccine & Test Management [Healthcare Analytics Software](/products/categories/healthcare-analytics-software?trk=products_details_guest_product_category) by [ShareMy.Health](https://www.linkedin.com/company/sharemyhealth/?trk=products_details_guest_organization_page) About Digital technology to support improved health outcomes amid wellness, infectious disease, virology and immunology. Vaccination credential upload, integration and verification for an individual to travel or gain access to a building, event or school. High end PCR testing solutions with lab results available in less than 24 hours. Antigen testing options and administration so everyone can securely test at an event, trade show, school or location. Through analytics, optimize the outcomes of a population minimizing costs and know exactly if a person is tested, vaccinated and healthy.
